channel.title: What Records do you hold at your school?
channel.description: Post any records you have at your school, academic, sports related, anything you want. I currently hold the longest "turbojeaveline" throw at 68.3 feet or something. Last year I got 3/4 blue ribbons for track and one third place. I got first for shotput but I didn't play against many people. I raced in the 60M sprint and got first (becasue I was racing against the people older than me, so I was the only one in the race from my age group), I set the javeline record for a blue ribbon, and I forgot what I got third in...some field event. Well anyways post :)

item.title: What Records do you hold at your school?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“kmb, post:21, topic:31257”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=45577.msg560419#msg560419 date=1165115908]

I used to be pretty athletic I think, I was in the top 3 in about every sport

And what happened?
[/quote]
I got lazy =P[/quote]
lol hahhah

Read full topic

First place in the state quarterback
Best Tuba player
Best soccer player the school ever had
Won the tennis championship
3rd place in the golf championship
2nd place for swimming
fastest running

But in reality i woke up and i got a 86% in math oh yeah (H)[/quote]

First in state quarteback, wow!

rabcarl:

Captain of the School Cricket Team x3 (Every year I’ve been in Primary :))
